function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Changing public knowledge affects study results","Impact":"Altered growth rate of infections and overestimation of policy effectiveness","Mitigation":"Consider the impact of public knowledge on study results","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools for data interpretation","People":"Researchers, analysts, policymakers","Owner":"Research team, data analysts"},{"Description":"Focus on confirmed infections may overlook hospitalizations and deaths","Impact":"Incomplete understanding of policy effectiveness and impact on public health","Mitigation":"Conduct additional studies on hospitalizations and deaths","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling tools","People":"Public health researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Public health research institutions"}]}
